name: Sidneys class
story: Youre in Sidneys class and cant wait to finish his boring class so that you can go to your brothers house in Chicago. But you need to go to your room to take your bags after his looong lecture.
nav: Press 1 to walk to the room and 2 to run

name: Run
story: You Run and fall and then die. Don�t run you couldve just walked safely

name: Room
story: Youre in your room. Quick! Pack your bags and go to the lobby for your ride
nav: Press 1 to go to the lobby

name: Residence Lobby
story: Yaay you are all set to go to the rental place to take your fancy car for the trip. You have 2 options, A stranger with a supercar is offering you a ride to rental place and theres trusty motti in his usual car ready to drop you there.
nav: Press 1 to take ride from stranger 2 to go with Motti

name: Random Stranger
story: You chose the supercar of a serialkiller. Don�t accept ride from strangers now he is going to sell you to jingalala land where you die of starvation while working.

name: Mottis Car
story: You chose trusty Motti. He safely will take you to the rental company.
nav: Press 1 to get down at the Rental place

name: Enterprise Rental
story: Welcome to Enterprise rental. They are ready with your fancy car. Take the keys and proceed to your car for the week.
nav: Press 1 to go to your faancy car

name: Fancy Car
story: Nice car. Super Fancy features, so clean. You start the 800 horsepower beast and alas! Gas is on empty! Better hurry to the gasstation.
nav: Press 1 to go to the gas station

name: Gas Station
story: Damn the prices are higher than ever today and your fancy car needs premium fuel. Hope you get to the highway and not bankrupt after filling up.
nav: Press 1 to full up the tank with extra premium 2 to fill normal premium

name: Bankrupt
story: Oh no they fooled me with saying extra premium petrol and used normal petrol and the car broke down in the middle on no way and i die in starvation.

name: 401 Highway
story: Nice you are now cruising on the highway. Youre enjoying the sunset and the roads. You see you have cruise control in you car. Go to the settings
nav: Press 1 to go to cruise settings

name: Cruise Speed
story: Wow it is adaptive cruise control! The car will basically drive itself through the highway. Set the speedlimit and itll do the rest. Becareful what speed you maintain. Cops are out in undercovr cars
nav: Press 1 for setting 180 kmph press 2 for 100 kmph

story: You set 180kmph! It feels like nothing in this fancy car. Your travel time reduced by an hour! Youre excited but oh no! Cops saw you. Lights are on. Oh no pull over.

name: Cops
story: Oh no you are now handcuffed and pinned to the ground for rash driving. You spend the night in jail and die.
You set to100 kmph. Nice being safe and following the rules. Proceed to the intersection to choose the road further ahead
nav: Press 1 to take 404 and 2 to take 409

name: 404 Highway
story: You can turn left or right. Your Map is acting funky. You believe its because of aliens scanning earth at night.
nav: Press 1 to take left and 2 to take right

name: Alaska
story: Oh no you took left and that was a wormhole Sector 51 scientists which shot you to a Snow deset in Alaska. Your car is stuck ontop of ice and you ran out of fuel for heat. Froze to death

name: 409 Highway
story: Oh thank god you took right. There was a rumour on the radio that the road left was a fake road made by Sector 51 scientists with wormholes that can kill you. Good job
nav: Press 1 to proceed to the canadian border

name: Canada Border
story: Nice you reached the Canadian border already! Hope you took all your papers. Border patrol is crazy these days.
nav: Press 1 to submit folder 1 press 2 to submit folder 2

name: Proper docs
story: Awesome you have the proper documents! Border patrol is super nice to you and you proceed driving to Detroit.

name: Improper docs
story: Damn where did the documents go! Move to the Border patrol inspection bay. Be careful what you say now.
nav: Press 1 to move to check bay and 2 to submit and try folder 2

name: Border Patrol
story: Oh no! Why did you offer bribe!? You did not have proper documents with you and they found an old bag of Pedros with weed in it. They are now angry and shoots you to death.

name: Detroit
story: City of Detroit. The famous old dead city. Be careful in taking turns here. You can end up in gangster corners who will simply shoot you and rob you.
nav: Press 1 to take left and 2 to take right

name: Gangsters
story: Oh no you took left! That was wrong! You drove into Brick Mansions where bad people live. They shoot you and rob you. You die.

name: Chicago city
story: At last! Chicago! Its homestretch now! Be careful again tho. Take one wrong turn and you can reach back to detroit.
nav: Press 1 to take left and 2 to take right

name: Jean House
story: Finally at Jeans house! You win! Go have an awesome dinner and go sleep. Enjoy your vacation!
